welcome_message_body: Welcome to Maple Ridge, where the natural beauty of the mountains meets the charm of a quaint, historic town. Enjoy our vibrant arts scene, delicious local cuisine, and endless outdoor adventures. We invite you to explore and experience all that Maple Ridge has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Abbotsford Airport provides all necessary amenities for travelers, including restaurants, shops, and restrooms.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Abbotsford Airport primarily serves private and charter flights, with limited amenities available.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a maximum usage time of 2 hours per device.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coal Harbour Airport houses all necessary facilities for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For the convenience of private jet travelers, there is a separate terminal at Coal Harbour Airport with exclusive lounges and services.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's wifi network for free by selecting the 'CXH Airport Wifi' network and entering the provided password.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vancouver International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Vancouver International Airport is primarily used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to small aircraft and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bellingham Airport serves all commercial flights and includes various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Bellingham Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
